dcterms:creator: P. Rajpurkar
J. Zhang
K. Lopyrev
P. Liang
dcterms:description: The SQuAD dataset contains more than 100,000 annotated examples for machine comprehension of text, widely used as a benchmark in MRC research.
dcterms:title: Stanford Question Answering Dataset (SQuAD)

dcterms:creator: R. Malhas
T. Elsayed
dcterms:description: The Qur’an Reading Comprehension Dataset (QRCD) consists of 1,337 question-passage-answer triplets extracted from the holy Qur’an, designed for Arabic question answering.
dcterms:title: Qur’an Reading Comprehension Dataset (QRCD)

dcterms:creator: H. Mozannar
E. Maamary
K. El Hajal
H. Hajj
dcterms:description: SOQAL contains two Arabic MRC datasets: the Arabic Reading Comprehension Dataset (ARCD) and a machine translation of the SQuAD dataset, providing a large resource for Arabic question answering.
dcterms:title: SOQAL

dcterms:creator: M. Richardson
C. J. Burges
E. Renshaw
dcterms:description: MCTest is a challenge dataset for open-domain machine comprehension of text, containing 500 stories and 2000 questions.
dcterms:title: MCTest
